Class CollegeFootballTeam

  • java.lang.Object
    • Team
      • CollegeFootballTeam

  • public class CollegeFootballTeam
extends Team
    Assignment 6, Fall 2014: CollegeFootballTeam Implement Team and its methods to design CollegeFootballTeam methods and objects. As data element, methods are inherited from Team class to accommodate any team, regardless of profession while implementing instance variables of CollegeFootballTeam
    Author:
    Ebony Cross
